text: Las Pasiones Infernales (also known as Pasiones Infernales) is a 1969 Puerto Rican-Mexican film production. It stars Velda Gonzalez, Hector Suarez, Esther Sandoval, Jaime Ruiz Escobar and Luis Antonio Cosme, among others. ==Plot== The movie deals with racism in the Latino community. It concentrates on racial differences between groups of whites and Blacks-Mestizo in a Spanish-speaking island. ==External links== * Category:1969 films Category:Mexican films Category:Puerto Rican films Category:1969 crime drama films Category:1969 drama films
title: Las Pasiones Infernales
